name: RedLight (hyperscope)
description:
Disclaimer game is still currently under development.

Controls

Player 1(left screen): WASD

Player 2 (right screen): arrows and LMB

Objective

Player 1:

To make as many loops as possible while avoiding traffic spawned by player 2.

Player 2:

To stop the player 1 by controlling traffic lights.

As the Player 1 approaches the intersection, click the red light (the farthest cube from the green cube), after a few seconds you will spawn a random amount of cars.

RedLight made by @hyperscope and @abdulazimabidov presented by the @VoyageArts collective.
